welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ich'on, Korea, South! Nestled in the beautiful Korean countryside, Ich'on is known for its traditional charm, stunning natural scenery, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suwon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Suwon Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Osan AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Osan AB Airport, primarily used for military and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at WonJu Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at WonJu Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
